content: Using YAML format, provide basic information (name, type, attribute, and level) for five Digimon characters.

Sure! Here are five Digimon characters with their basic information in YAML format:

```yaml
- name: Agumon
  type: Fresh
  attribute: Vaccine
  level: 1

- name: Gabumon
  type: Fresh
  attribute: Vaccine
  level: 1

- name: Tentomon
  type: Fresh
  attribute: Data
  level: 1

- name: Palmon
  type: Fresh
  attribute: Vaccine
  level: 1

- name: Biyomon
  type: Fresh
  attribute: Vaccine
  level: 1
```

I've included some of the original Digimon from the first season of the anime. Each has the type "Fresh," which is the starting stage before they digivolve into higher forms. Their attributes are either Vaccine or Data, which are common for Fresh-level Digimon. The level is set to 1, indicating their initial stage in the Digimon hierarchy.
